casebody.data:
Paulette STENZEL, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
BEST BUY COMPANY, INC., Defendant,
and
Samsung Electronics America, Inc., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156262
COA: 328804 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of Michigan Defense Trial Court, Inc., to extend the time for filing its brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on July 25, 2018, is accepted for filing.
